title: How to Open Mobi Files on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: E-mail the MOBI file to yourself.
steps.content: E-mail the MOBI file to yourself. The Kindle app only displays MOBI books you purchased through the app. Downloading the file as an email attachment makes it so you can open the file anyway. See Email Files to learn how to send the attachment.

steps.title: Open the Mail app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Mail app on your iPhone or iPad. It's the blue and white envelope icon typically found at the bottom of the screen. If you use a different app for email, open that instead.

steps.title: Tap the message that contains the MOBI file.
steps.content: Tap the message that contains the MOBI file. The contents of the message will appear.

steps.title: Tap Tap to Download.
steps.content: Tap Tap to Download . It's at the bottom of the message. A Kindle icon will replace the “Tap to Download” text.

steps.title: Tap the Kindle icon.
steps.content: Tap the Kindle icon. It's right in the area where the “Tap to Download” button was. A menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Copy to Kindle.
steps.content: Tap Copy to Kindle . You may have to swipe across the icons at the top of the menu to find this option. This will open the MOBI file in the Kindle app.

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . You'll usually find this app on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . It's at the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Type mobi reader into the search bar.
steps.content: Type mobi reader into the search bar. A list of results will appear.

steps.title: Tap GET on “MOBI Reader.”
steps.content: Tap GET on “MOBI Reader.” It's the app with the blue icon that says “MOBI” above an open book.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . MOBI Reader will now download to your iPhone or iPad.

steps.title: Open MOBI Reader.
steps.content: Open MOBI Reader. If you're still in the App Store, tap Open . Otherwise, tap the blue icon with “MOBI” and an open book on the home screen.

steps.title: Navigate to the folder that contains the MOBI file.
steps.content: Navigate to the folder that contains the MOBI file. If you downloaded it from your web browser, it's likely in the Recently Downloaded folder. If the MOBI file is saved to a cloud service like Google Drive or Dropbox, you can add those services in MOBI Reader. Tap Edit at the top-right corner of the screen, select your cloud service, then follow the on-screen instructions to access the file.

steps.title: Tap the MOBI file.
steps.content: Tap the MOBI file. This opens the file for reading in the MOBI Reader app. If the MOBI file is in the cloud, it may take a few minutes to download before opening.
